application.AssetComment

Description
application
 

  • Uses of AssetComment in application

    Methods in application that return types with arguments of type AssetComment
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Iterable<AssetComment>
    MainController.getAllComment()
    This method fetches all the asset comments stored in the database and returns a JSON file of the content to the web page.
    Optional<AssetComment>
    MainController.getCommentById(Integer id)
    This method is a query function to request the details of an asset by its Id number in the url localhost:8080/comment/find/{id}.
    Methods in application with parameters of type AssetComment
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String>
    MainController.addNewComment(AssetComment comment)
    Post request to fetch comment data from UI form and add it to the database.
